name: Me, the Singularity
description:
Synopsis

Terra is a scientist on a deep space research station studying a binary system consisting of a black hole and a dead star. One day Terra starts seeing strange things that can only be described as ghostly. Is the station being haunted? Or is Terra going crazy? With the help of her colleagues she must find the answer. If not, they and the entire station could meet a grisly end...

Solve the mystery with one of Terra's colleagues: Casimir the hardass ex-military cyborg, or Cyan the uber-sweet space elf.

Features
  • Two romanceable characters
  • Two different ending variants
Warnings

Flickering/flashing images, mild gore, jumpscares, copious foul language, sex references.

Credits

Produced by supercircuit for Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2022

Backgrounds, illustration, GUI, scenario: supercircuit

Music: FLASH BEAT, Sharou, MATSU, KHAIM, かずち via Dova-Syndrome

Sound: freesfx.co.uk

Source code

Source code for this game is available to view and download here. If you develop games with Ren'Py you may find this useful.

Known issues v1.0 (jam version), v1.1
  • Sprite positioning issues on first run. Quitting and re-opening the game should fix this. Should be fixed in v1.1.1. Please redownload the latest version (PC v1.1.1, Mac v3)
All versions
  • Animation issue when entering the game menu from certain scenes
